author: Megan Cerullo
title: Black and Hispanic workers less able to work from home
description: Only 6% of service industry employees say they can work from home, federal labor data show.
content: The governors of California, Illinois and New York last week issued lockdowns on their states requiring that non-essential workers stay home to avoid spreading the coronavirus. Those restrictions hit certain minority groups especially hard, research suggest. … [+1812 chars]
